Recent updates in NYC include a significant weather pattern shift as Thanksgiving approaches, public e-bike battery swapping stations to reduce fire risks, and ongoing concerns over rising antisemitic incidents, alongside Mayor Adams' administration opposing a controversial Airbnb bill and the approval of affordable housing projects in the Bronx.

### Risks & Alerts

- Seniors shoved to ground and punched in face in recent NYC attacks, raising safety concerns. - Significant shift in weather pattern expected as Thanksgiving approaches, prepare for possible disruptions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC to install public e-bike battery swapping stations to reduce fire risk associated with batteries. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMioAFBVV95cUxNc3NjRlU2WEpqZHdGSlNEbDhQNGgzWjhpWEIzX2k1Zk5ucE5MT3FoeWNFZVhLVWRhWHdyODBkVGRObTdGMEU3VGgzREpLblZZSjZJdEpKaG1UNnlEZXV3TzA5c0VIcU5FMUhBOWlFZE5SWFoycWxGS3lKRHBtblpxdUtlekswSDNwaGpydmU4UUFvdldnWVYzUmJEVDFXeW8y?oc=5)
